TowerModeCylinder.Name: Cylindrical 2D Movement Area [Cylinder]

GravityFollowLiftBig.Notes: A thick platform with a darker gravity display panel.

SliderSnowFrontWall.Name: Freezy Flake -- Slide Blockade

VsKingTossinPlanet.Name: Boulder Bowl -- Rollodillo Planet
VsKingTossinPlanet.Notes: The planet where Rollodillo is fought in Boulder Bowl Galaxy.

GarigariCutStepFlatMiniB.Name: Puzzle Plank -- Short Piece of Wood

GliderChangeVisiblePillar.Name: Fleet Glide -- Long Pillar

AsteroidC.Name: Medium Decorative Asteroids

AsteroidB.Name: Small Decorative Asteroids

CloudSliderObstacle.Name: Cloudy Court -- Wooden Obstacle

GarigariCutStepCircle.Name: Puzzle Plank -- Circle Piece of Wood
GarigariCutStepCircle.Notes: A circular-shaped piece of wood; used in Puzzle Plank Galaxy.

DashYoshiMoveClimbPartsA.Name: Hightail Falls -- Destroyed Moving Wood Platform
DashYoshiMoveClimbPartsA.Notes: A moving platform used in the first mission of Hightail Falls Galaxy.

BossBussunPlanet.Name: Flipsville -- Glamdozer Planet
BossBussunPlanet.Notes: The planet used at the end of the first mission of Flipsville Galaxy.

YoshiCaughtPlanet.Name: Yoshi Star -- Main Planet

LavaProminence.Name: Fireball
LavaProminence.Notes: A fireball used in lava-themed galaxies.

BattleUnizoLandPlanet.Name: Battle Belt -- Land Urchin Planet
BattleUnizoLandPlanet.Notes: The rocky planet from Battle Belt Galaxy that features several Land Urchins.

Trapeze.Name: Vine Swing

HipDropMoveRock.Name: Clockworld Ruins -- Grassy Ground Pound Block

KoopaBattleLv1Planet.Notes: The planet where Bowser is fought in Bowser's Lava Lair.

WorldMap07Sky.Name: World S Sky
WorldMap07Sky.Notes: The sky model from World S.

GiantRotationPlanet.Name: Clockwork Ruins -- Starting Planet

TubeSliderCoinCreatorPurple.Name: Slider Purple Coin Group
TubeSliderCoinCreatorPurple.Notes: A group of Purple Coins that appear during slide sections.

KoopaVS1Sky.Name: Star Reactor Sky

MorphItemCollectionCloud.Name: Decorative Cloud Flower

Tongari2D.Name: Spiny Hermit [2D]

UFOShapePassThroughPlanetParts.Notes: A log that covers the holes of the starting planet in Sky Station Galaxy.

MiniPlanetAcrossPlanetMistA.Name: Yoshi Star -- Grass Bonus Planet Trails
MiniPlanetAcrossPlanetMistA.Notes: The planet path trails used on the grass bonus planet in Yoshi Star Galaxy.

SwitchingMoveBlockStartPlanet.Name: Flip-Out -- Starting Planet

SwitchingMoveBuzzAreaBlockBlue.Name: Flip-Out -- Chopper Section Blue Walls
SwitchingMoveBuzzAreaBlockBlue.Notes: A set of blue walls used in the middle section of Flip-Out Galaxy's main planet.

ChallengeGliderStartPlanet.Name: Fleet Glide -- Battleship Planet

DashFruit.Name: Dash Pepper

TubeSliderGoalPlanet.Name: Tall Trunk -- Slide Goal Planet
TubeSliderGoalPlanet.Notes: The planet used at the end of the slide in Tall Trunk Galaxy.

MameMuimuiScorer.Name: Skate Challenge Controller [Freezy Flake]
MameMuimuiScorer.Notes: A controller used to control The Chimp's skating challenge in Freezy Flake Galaxy.

KoopaSealFieldMiddle.Name: Purple Bowser Door

TogepinScorer.Name: Bowling Challenge Controller
TogepinScorer.Notes: A controller that sets up bowling challenges and controls the scoring.

SliderGoalSlopeA.Name: Rolling Coaster -- Goal Ramp Planet
SliderGoalSlopeA.Notes: The long ramp leading to the goal platform; used in Rolling Coaster Galaxy.

DashYoshiTimerBridgePartsB.Name: Hightail Falls -- Large Stone Platform
DashYoshiTimerBridgePartsB.Notes: The falling large stone platforms used in the first mission of Hightail Falls Galaxy.

KoopaBattleSky.Name: Bowser Fight Sky
KoopaBattleSky.Notes: The sky model used during the fights against Bowser in Bowser's Lava Lair, Bowser's Gravity Gauntlet and Bowser's Galaxy Generator.

DashYoshiTimerBridgePartsA.Name: Hightail Falls -- Small Stone Platform
DashYoshiTimerBridgePartsA.Notes: The falling small stone platforms used in the first mission of Hightail Falls Galaxy.

TicoFatCoin.Name: Hungry Luma [Coins]
TicoFatCoin.Notes: A pink Luma that is hungry for Coins.

GoroRockLanePartsHole.Name: Bowling Challenge -- Blue Platform with Gap
GoroRockLanePartsHole.Notes: A flat blue platform with a gap used in The Chimp's bowling challenge in Melty Monster Galaxy.

MorphItemNeoFire.Name: Fire Flower
MorphItemNeoFire.Notes: A Fire Flower that transforms the player into a Fire character.

OnimasuPlanetRailMovePartsA.Name: Stone Cyclone -- Moving Stone Block
OnimasuPlanetRailMovePartsA.Notes: A rectangular stone block that is used in Beach Bowl Galaxy and Stone Cyclone Galaxy.

VsOtaRockTankIcePlanet.Name: Shiverburn -- Prince Pikante Planet
VsOtaRockTankIcePlanet.Notes: The planet where Prince Pikante is fought in Shiverburn Galaxy.

BloomArea.Name: Bloom Effect Area
BloomArea.Notes: An area that enables model bloom.

DustFlower.Name: Flowers Debris

OldFortressUnderCover.Name: Throwback -- Bottom Fortress Cover
OldFortressUnderCover.Notes: The cover used at the bottom of Throwback Galaxy.

WanwanObstacleFloaterA.Name: Chompworks -- Square Sinking Platform

WanwanObstacleFloaterC.Notes: A narrow blue and green sinking platform that is used on the Golden Chomp planet in Chompworks Galaxy.

KoopaFinalBattlePos.Notes: The final boss battle from Bowser's Galaxy Generator that takes place in the sky.

MagmaMonsterBigPlanet.Name: Melty Monster -- Large Lava Planet
MagmaMonsterBigPlanet.Notes: A large lava-covered planet used at the start of Melty Monster Galaxy.

DossunBig.Name: Massive Thwomp
DossunBig.Notes: A massive Thwomp used in Supermassive Galaxy that falls periodically.

NeedlePlantFly.Name: Flying Spiky Plant

SandUpDownTowerBreakableWallB.Name: Dusty Dune -- Destroyable Crate B
SandUpDownTowerBreakableWallB.Notes: A tall destroyable wood box from Dusty Dune Galaxy.

SandUpDownTowerBreakableWallA.Name: Dusty Dune -- Destroyable Crate A
SandUpDownTowerBreakableWallA.Notes: A tall destroyable wood box intended to be used in Dusty Dune Galaxy.

TeresaRoomGlaringLight.Name: Deep Dark -- Boo Box Light Beam
TeresaRoomGlaringLight.Notes: A decorative beam of light that is used in the Boo Box in Deep Dark Galaxy.

TubeSliderStartPlanet.Name: Tall Trunk -- Slide Start Planet

DandelionHillPlanet.Notes: The planet where Major Burrows is fought; used in both Gusty Garden Galaxy and Boss Blitz Galaxy.

GhostMazePushDoor.Name: Boo Moon -- Disguised Maze Door [Counter-clockwise]
GhostMazePushDoor.Notes:
A door disguised as a wall piece of the dark maze planet in Boo Moon Galaxy.
This variant opens counter-clockwise.

GlobalSegmentGravity.Name: Cylindrical Gravity
GlobalSegmentGravity.Notes: A gravity area that pulls objects towards the lateral surface of the cylinder.

YoshiCapture.Name: Yoshi Grapple
YoshiCapture.Notes: A flower which Yoshi can grapple with his tongue to swing himself in its direction.

Cactus.Name: Damaging Cactus
Cactus.Notes: A cactus that can damage the player or other objects upon contact.

BreakableTrash.Name: Gearmo Challenge Trash
BreakableTrash.Notes: A pile of trash that the player must destroy during the trash minigames in Battlerock Galaxy and Dreadnought Galaxy.

MarioFaceShipPlanet.Name: Starship Mario -- Main Planet
MarioFaceShipPlanet.Notes: The main planet that makes up the Starship Mario.

SkyIslandStepPartsB.Name: Cloudy Court -- Square Platform with Wood Planks
SkyIslandStepPartsB.Notes: A grassy platform with wood planks; used in Cloudy Court Galaxy.

SkyIslandStepPartsC.Name: Cloudy Court -- Square Platform with Flowers
SkyIslandStepPartsC.Notes: A grassy platform with several flowers; used in Cloudy Court Galaxy.

TwisterSanSlim.Name: Slim Galactic Tornado
TwisterSanSlim.Notes: A slim tornado enemy with a somewhat wide attraction range.

CancelBeeMorphArea.Name: Cancel Bee Power-Up Area
CancelBeeMorphArea.Notes: Removes the Bee power-up from the player if they go inside the area.

SearchBeamer.Name: Sentry Beam
SearchBeamer.Notes: A robot enemy that fires a laser at Mario.

SkyIslandStepPartsA.Name: Cloudy Court -- Square Platform with Single Flower
SkyIslandStepPartsA.Notes: A grassy platform with a single flower; used in Cloudy Court Galaxy and Grandmaster Galaxy.

BakuBakuClipStep.Name: Lava Lair -- Mattermouth Carpet
BakuBakuClipStep.Notes: The large carpet from Bowser's Lava Lair that is eaten away by Mattermouths.

HeadLight.Name: Spotlight
HeadLight.Notes: The spotlight effect used on the starting planet of Boo Moon Galaxy. GhostMazePlanetMask provides the actual darkness.

SunkenShip.Name: Deep Dark -- Sunken Ship
SunkenShip.Notes: A sunken ghost ship that appears on Deep Dark Galaxy's seafloor.

TogeBegomanLauncher.Name: Spiky Topman Spawner
TogeBegomanLauncher.Notes: A black hole that spawns Spiky Topman. Defeated Spiky Topman will respawn after some time.

BasaBasa.Name: Swooper
BasaBasa.Notes: A bat enemy that is mostly found in cave sections.

HanachanBig.Name: Big Wiggler
HanachanBig.Notes: A bigger version of a Wiggler. May run around aggressively.

OldFortressTopCover.Name: Throwback -- Top Fortress Cover
OldFortressTopCover.Notes: The cover used at the top of Throwback Galaxy.

Tamakoro.Name: Star Ball
Tamakoro.Notes: A ball with a Power Star or Purple Coin inside it.

BattleGrapyonPlanetParts.Name: Battle Belt -- Swaphopper Planet Blockade
BattleGrapyonPlanetParts.Notes: A small blockade that covers the exit from Battle Belt Galaxy's Swaphopper planet.

Flag.Name: Sea Slide Flag
Flag.Notes: A flag used in both Loopdeeloop Galaxy and Sea Slide Galaxy.

KoopaStatueVomit.Name: Turning Bowser Statue
KoopaStatueVomit.Notes: A statue of Bowser that can turn around. The actual laser is created using an ElectricRail object.

ZeroGravityCylinder.Name: Zero Gravity [Cylinder Range]
ZeroGravityCylinder.Notes: A gravity area of zero gravity. This one has a cylindrical range.

BothSideMazeRoomPlanet.Name: Flipsville -- Starting Planet
BothSideMazeRoomPlanet.Notes: The starting planet used in the first mission of Flipsville Galaxy.

BattanKing.Name: Whomp King
BattanKing.Notes: The large stone block boss from Throwback Galaxy.

MorphItemNeoHopper.Name: Spring Mushroom
MorphItemNeoHopper.Notes: A Spring Mushroom that transforms the player into a Spring character.

SandBirdPartsTailRight.Name: Sand Bird Right Striped Tail
SandBirdPartsTailRight.Notes: The right piece of the tail of the Sand Bird used in Slipsand Galaxy.

JumpStand.Name: Ground Pound Spring
JumpStand.Notes: A spring that bounces the player into the air when Ground Pounding it.

MonteStatue.Name: Starshine Beach -- Pianta Statue
MonteStatue.Notes: The large Pianta statue used in Starshine Beach Galaxy.

WanwanRolling.Name: Chomp
WanwanRolling.Notes: A rolling Chomp that moves along a set path.

SnowBlockTicoSearchPlanet.Name: Freezy Flake -- Snow Blocks Planet
SnowBlockTicoSearchPlanet.Notes: The planet with snow blocks and Li'l Brrs used in the first mission of Freezy Flake Galaxy.

OtaRockTank.Name: Prince Pikante
OtaRockTank.Notes: The green octopus boss driving in a wheeled barrel that is fought in Shiverburn Galaxy.

PunchBox2D.Name: Brick Block [2D]
PunchBox2D.Notes: A small Brick Block variant that is used in the prologue.

YellowChip.Name: Star Chip
YellowChip.Notes: A collectable yellow chip. Usually, five of them have to be collected.

DinoPackunBabyBattlePlanetAir.Name: Sky Station -- Egg Shell Shards
DinoPackunBabyBattlePlanetAir.Notes: A set of egg shell shards used around Peewee Piranha's planet in Sky Station Galaxy.

SoundEmitterSphere.Name: Sound Emitter Area [Sphere]
SoundEmitterSphere.Notes: An area that starts playing a sound effect when entered. This always has a spherical range.

GiantRotationRockD.Name: Clockwork Ruins -- Launch Star Gear
GiantRotationRockD.Notes: A gear used to reach the Launch Star on the starting planet of Clockwork Ruins Galaxy.

GiantRotationRockC.Name: Clockwork Ruins -- Cross Gear
GiantRotationRockC.Notes: A gear with a "cross"-like design of blocks used on the starting planet of Clockwork Ruins Galaxy.

KoopaJrLv2StartPlanet.Name: Fearsome Fleet -- Starting Platforms
KoopaJrLv2StartPlanet.Notes: The set of platforms used at the start of Bowser Jr.'s Fearsome Fleet.

GiantRotationRockB.Name: Clockwork Ruins -- L-Blocks Gear
GiantRotationRockB.Notes: A gear with opposite L-shaped blocks used on the starting planet of Clockwork Ruins Galaxy.

GiantRotationRockA.Name: Clockwork Ruins -- Staircase Gear
GiantRotationRockA.Notes: A gear with opposite staircases used on the starting planet of Clockwork Ruins Galaxy.

MirrorArea.Name: Mirror Reflection Area
MirrorArea.Notes: An object that mirrors some compatible objects onto a compatible surface. This is effectively useless in SMG2 since no objects can reflect mirror models.

BenefitItemLifeUp.Name: Life Mushroom
BenefitItemLifeUp.Notes: A collectable mushroom that increases the player's health to 6.

LeafManholeCover.Name: Flipsville -- Flippable Grate
LeafManholeCover.Notes: A red grate that can be flipped over; used in Flipsville Galaxy.

AbekobeCircleMoveLift.Name: Rightside Down -- Checkered Moving Wood Platform
AbekobeCircleMoveLift.Notes: A moving platform from Rightside Down Galaxy. It has a checker patterned surface.

RedBlueExStepE.Name: Flip-Swap -- Small Platform
RedBlueExStepE.Notes: A pair of two blocks that serve as a platform; used in Flip-Swap Galaxy.

RedBlueExStepD.Name: Flip-Swap -- Cosmic Guide Platform
RedBlueExStepD.Notes: The platform where the Cosmic Guide appears in Flip-Swap Galaxy.

RedBlueExStepC.Name: Flip-Swap -- Checkpoint Platform
RedBlueExStepC.Notes: The staircase platform where the checkpoint is located in Flip-Swap Galaxy.

RockCreator.Name: Large Boulder Spawner
RockCreator.Notes: A spawner for large rolling boulders.

SwitchingMoveStairsAreaBlockRed.Name: Flip-Out -- Stairs Section Red Walls
SwitchingMoveStairsAreaBlockRed.Notes: A set of red walls used in the first section of Flip-Out Galaxy's main planet.

RedBlueExStepB.Name: Flip-Swap -- Goomba Platform
RedBlueExStepB.Notes: A rectangular platform where Goombas are located in Flip-Swap Galaxy.

TicoShop.Name: Lumalee Shop [Mushrooms]
TicoShop.Notes: A large blue Luma that can transform on the spot into either a Life Mushroom or a 1-Up Mushroom after being paid some Star Bits.

RedBlueExStepF.Name: Flip-Swap -- Power Star Platform
RedBlueExStepF.Notes: The platform where the Power Star is located in Flip-Swap Galaxy.

DashYoshiWallClimbPlanet.Name: Hightail Falls -- Tall Wall Climb Planet
DashYoshiWallClimbPlanet.Notes: The second planet used in the first mission of Hightail Falls Galaxy.

WanwanEscapePlanet.Name: Chompworks -- Lava Chomps Planet
WanwanEscapePlanet.Notes: The second planet used that features a long bridge Chompworks Galaxy.

GravityFollowLift2DPlanet.Name: Upside Dizzy -- Starting Section
GravityFollowLift2DPlanet.Notes: The first section of the first planet used in Upside Dizzy Galaxy.

KoopaJrRobot.Name: Megahammer
KoopaJrRobot.Notes: The boss fought at the end of Bowser Jr.'s Fearsome Fleet.

DustCloud.Name: Clouds Debris
DustCloud.Notes: A set of clouds used as space debris.

RedBlueExStepA.Name: Flip-Swap -- Starting Platforms
RedBlueExStepA.Notes: A set of platforms used as the starting planet of Flip-Swap Galaxy.

GlobalDiskTorusGravity.Name: Torus Gravity
GlobalDiskTorusGravity.Notes: A gravity area for a torus-shaped planet.

WaterFortressRain.Name: Space Storm Rain
WaterFortressRain.Notes: The rain effect from Space Storm Galaxy. This will crash the game without a specific setup.

TamakoroGoalRelayStep.Name: Rolling Masterpiece -- Silver Chomp Planet Ruler
TamakoroGoalRelayStep.Notes: A large ruler platform used on the Silver Chomp planet in Rolling Masterpiece Galaxy.

JumpHoleTamakoroB.Name: Rolling Masterpiece -- Disk Planet Star Ball Launcher
JumpHoleTamakoroB.Notes: The Star Ball launcher used on the third planet of Rolling Masterpiece Galaxy.

GravityFollowLift.Name: Upside Dizzy -- Platform with Gravity Panel
GravityFollowLift.Notes: A platform with a gravity display panel.

JumpHoleTamakoroA.Name: Rolling Masterpiece -- Paintbrush Planet Star Ball Launcher
JumpHoleTamakoroA.Notes: The Star Ball launcher used on the second planet of Rolling Masterpiece Galaxy.

CircleCoinGroup.Name: Coin Circle
CircleCoinGroup.Notes: An object that spawns several Coins in a circle.

CloudValleyTowerPlanet.Name: Fluffy Bluff -- Cloud Tower Planet
CloudValleyTowerPlanet.Notes: The cloud tower planet used for the secret Star mission of Fluffy Bluff Galaxy.

ConstructionLight.Name: Construction Light
ConstructionLight.Notes: A destroyable construction light; used in Spin-Dig Galaxy.

Kuribo.Name: Goomba
Kuribo.Notes: The infamous Goomba enemy that appeared in most Mario games since 1985.

FountainBig.Name: Large Water Fountain
FountainBig.Notes: A large water fountain from Gold Leaf Galaxy, Fluffy Bluff Galaxy and other stages.

MarioLauncher.Name: Player Cannon
MarioLauncher.Notes: A cannon that the player can use to shoot themselves to distant places.

WorldMapSyncSoundEmitterCube.Name: World Sound Emitter Area [Cube]
WorldMapSyncSoundEmitterCube.Notes: An area that plays a sound effect if the currently selected world matches the specified world. The cube's origin is the base's center.

IceMagmaSkatePlanet.Name: Shiverburn -- Skating Planet
IceMagmaSkatePlanet.Notes: The third planet in the first mission of Shiverburn Galaxy.

SecretGate.Name: Comet Medal Gate
SecretGate.Notes: A red and yellow gate used in gliding levels to unlock the Comet Medal for collection afterwards.

BigCloudStepMountainTop.Name: Fluffy Bluff -- Ring Cloud Platform
BigCloudStepMountainTop.Notes: A ring-shaped cloud platform that can be stood on using the Bee and Cloud power-ups.

BlueStarGuidanceArea.Name: Pull Star Explanation Area
BlueStarGuidanceArea.Notes: An area that, if entered, notifies the player how to use Pull Stars.

Gorogoro.Name: Rhomp
Gorogoro.Notes: A cylindrical-shaped rolling stone obstacle used in Slipsand Galaxy.

LavaDrillKillerPlanet.Name: Galaxy Generator -- Banzai Bill Planet
LavaDrillKillerPlanet.Notes: The planet with Banzai Bills and the Spin Drill used in Bowser's Galaxy Generator.

RailCoin.Name: Coin Line
RailCoin.Notes: An object that creates a path of Coins.

MarinePlant.Name: Underwater Plant
MarinePlant.Notes: A decorative plant for underwater sections.

Pole.Name: Climbable Pole
Pole.Notes: A standard climbable pole that can be climbed from all directions.

BallRail.Name: Star Ball Rail
BallRail.Notes: An invisible path that the Star Ball will move on once touched.

BarrelGravityAir.Name: Space Storm Foggy Atmosphere
BarrelGravityAir.Notes: The gray foggy air that surrounds the cylindrical planets in Space Storm Galaxy.

DotPatternSky.Name: Twisty Trials Sky
DotPatternSky.Notes: The sky model used in Twisty Trials Galaxy.

BattleKaninaPlanet.Name: Battle Belt -- Crabber Planet
BattleKaninaPlanet.Notes: The sand planet from Battle Belt Galaxy that features several Crabbers.

FireBarCoverA.Name: Large Fire Bar Barrel
FireBarCoverA.Notes: A large barrel that is used to hide the Used Block of a Fire Bar. Used in Bowser's Lava Lair.

PostOutlineArea.Name: Post Outline Area
PostOutlineArea.Notes: An area that renders a thick outline on the screen when entered.

CareTakerHunter.Name: Gearmo Enemy Hunter
CareTakerHunter.Notes: A Gold or Silver Gearmo. Used in Boulder Bowl Galaxy and Space Storm Galaxy.

BothSideDrillTowerPlanet.Name: Flipsville -- Dirt Columns Planet
BothSideDrillTowerPlanet.Notes: The dirt-covered planet used in the second mission of Flipsville Galaxy.

AncientCage.Name: Clockwork Ruins -- Luma Cage
AncientCage.Notes: The red metal cage from Clockwork Ruins Galaxy.

RailPlacementPoleObstacle.Name: Rolling Masterpiece -- Paintbrush Line
RailPlacementPoleObstacle.Notes: An object used to create a line of paintbrushes; used in Rolling Masterpiece Galaxy.

Togezo.Name: Spiny
Togezo.Notes: A red-shelled enemy with spikes on its back.

ItemRoomItemBase.Name: Starship Mario -- Power-Up Display Case
ItemRoomItemBase.Notes: A display case for the power-up display room used on Starship Mario.

NokonokoLandBig.Name: Big Koopa Troopa
NokonokoLandBig.Notes: A large turtle that can be defeated with the Spin Drill.

BakubakuCircleConveyor.Name: Haunty Halls -- Small Rotating Carpet Platform

CollapsePlane.Name: Shrinking Tile
CollapsePlane.Notes: A green tile that slowly disappears once the player touches it.

BeyondHorizonSky.Name: Slimy Spring Sky
BeyondHorizonSky.Notes: The sunset sky model from Slimy Spring Galaxy.

SwitchArea.Name: Switch Area
SwitchArea.Notes: An area that activates a switch once the player enters it.

MysteryFlipPanelBrightPlanet.Name: Sweet Mystery -- Invisible Flipswitch Platforms
MysteryFlipPanelBrightPlanet.Notes: A set of hidden platforms used in the Flipswitch section of Sweet Mystery Galaxy that become visible when using Bulb Yoshi.

RailMoveDisappearStep.Name: Throwback -- Collapsing Stone Platform
RailMoveDisappearStep.Notes: A stone platform that falls when the player steps on it.

NeedleTrapSide.Name: Wall Spike Trap
NeedleTrapSide.Notes: A wall-connected trap with spikes that pop out periodically.

Kiraira.Name: Underwater Mine
Kiraira.Notes: A stationary mine used in Deep Dark Galaxy.

BendSwanpStepA.Name: Boo Moon -- Folding Swamp Starting Platform
BendSwanpStepA.Notes: The starting platform from Boo Moon Galaxy's folding swamp planet.

HammerHeadPackunSpike.Name: Spiny Piranha Plant
HammerHeadPackunSpike.Notes: A big black Piranha Plant with spikes on its head and body. It can only defeated with another object, such as a Stretch Plant or a Rainbow Star.

BegomanSpringHide.Name: Passive Spring Topman
BegomanSpringHide.Notes: A variant of a Spring Topman that resides in the ground and jumps out once the player gets near. It emits a Topmini if hit with a Spin Attack.

Blue2DSky.Name: Honeybloom Sky
Blue2DSky.Notes: The sky model used in Honeybloom Galaxy.

GlobalWireGravity.Name: Wire Gravity
GlobalWireGravity.Notes: A gravity area that uses a path to define several points of gravity.

DashRing.Name: Boost Ring
DashRing.Notes: A ring that boosts the speed of the player when passed through.

KoopaNpc.Name: Tiny Bowser
KoopaNpc.Notes: A tiny version of Bowser used in the end credits.

GarigariCutStepFlatThick.Name: Puzzle Plank -- Thick Piece of Wood
GarigariCutStepFlatThick.Notes: A thick piece of wood used in Puzzle Plank Galaxy.

HighSpeedLiftRock.Name: Clockwork Ruins -- Stone Elevator Platform
HighSpeedLiftRock.Notes: A stone elevator platform used near the end of the first mission of Clockwork Ruins Galaxy.

GarigariCutStepFlatThreeCenter.Name: Puzzle Plank -- Triplet Set of Wood Center Piece
GarigariCutStepFlatThreeCenter.Notes: The center piece of a set of three pieces of wood used in Puzzle Plank Galaxy.

RotateFireBar2DRotateStep.Name: Gravity Gauntlet -- Large Rotating Wheel
RotateFireBar2DRotateStep.Notes: A large rotating wheel used near the end of Bowser's Gravity Gauntlet.

StarPieceSpot.Name: Star Bit Spawn Point
StarPieceSpot.Notes: An object that spawns several Star Bits when activated.

GhostTower2DPlanet.Name: Boo Moon -- Mansion Planet
GhostTower2DPlanet.Notes: The large mansion planet used in the second mission of Boo Moon Galaxy.

GhostMazeWall.Name: Boo Moon -- Maze Planet Blockade
GhostMazeWall.Notes: A wall used to block access to the Warp Pipe on the maze planet of Boo Moon Galaxy.

GiantTeresaCirclePlanet.Name: Haunty Halls -- Starting Planet
GiantTeresaCirclePlanet.Notes: The solid platforms used on the starting planet of Haunty Halls Galaxy.

HoneyQueenPlanet.Name: Queen Bee Planet
HoneyQueenPlanet.Notes: The planet where the Queen Bee is found. Although this object exists in both games, they have entirely different models in each game.

CrystalCageOpaLL.Name: Large Opaque Crystal
CrystalCageOpaLL.Notes: A large destroyable crystal that is not transparent.

HazeCube.Name: Haze Area [Cube]
HazeCube.Notes: A haze screen effect used in lava-themed galaxies. The cube's origin is the base's center.

MorphItemCollectionBee.Name: Decorative Bee Mushroom
MorphItemCollectionBee.Notes: A Bee Mushroom used in the power-up display room of Starship Mario.

KoopaJrCastleCloudStep.Name: Boom Bunker -- Dark Cloud Platform
KoopaJrCastleCloudStep.Notes: A dark cloud platform used in Bowser Jr.'s Boom Bunker as well as Cloudy Court Galaxy.

GeneralRestartPos.Name: Star Ball Respawn Position
GeneralRestartPos.Notes: Can be used to define a Star Ball's respawn position after collecting a Checkpoint Flag.

RotateStepAthleticPlanet.Name: Twisty Trials -- Wood Platforms
RotateStepAthleticPlanet.Notes: The three solid wood platforms used in Twisty Trials Galaxy.

SandBirdPartsCorner.Name: Sand Bird Corner Block
SandBirdPartsCorner.Notes: A corner piece used for the Sand Bird in Slipsand Galaxy.

BendSwanpStepC.Name: Boo Moon -- Folding Swamp Curved Platform
BendSwanpStepC.Notes: The curved platform from Boo Moon Galaxy's folding swamp planet.

PhantomBonfire.Name: Red Flame
PhantomBonfire.Notes: A small red flame used on a torch.

BendSwanpStepB.Name: Boo Moon -- Folding Swamp Midway Platform
BendSwanpStepB.Notes: The second platform from Boo Moon Galaxy's folding swamp planet.

Drill2DReflectMazeRoom.Name: Spin-Dig -- 2D Maze Planet
Drill2DReflectMazeRoom.Notes: The interior of the cylindrical-shaped planet used in the second mission of Spin-Dig Galaxy.

TriangleTowerRotateStepSpring.Name: Chompworks -- Spring Tower Rotating Metal Gear
TriangleTowerRotateStepSpring.Notes: A rotating metal gear used on the spring tower planet in Chompworks Galaxy.

WarpPod.Name: Warp Pad
WarpPod.Notes: A warp pad that warps the player from one place to another. May also be invisible depending on the setup.

WaterFortressRotateStepD.Name: Space Storm -- Thin Rotating Metal Platforms
WaterFortressRotateStepD.Notes: A set of thin red rotating metal platforms from Space Storm Galaxy.

HShapeBlockSetPlanet.Name: Puzzle Plank -- Wiggler Planet
HShapeBlockSetPlanet.Notes: The planet where two Wigglers and a large H-shaped hole are found; used in Puzzle Plank Galaxy.

FallDownWall.Name: Fleet Glide -- Large Metal Door
FallDownWall.Notes: A large metal door that closes near the end of Fleet Glide Galaxy.

ClipCutRoadE.Name: Haunty Halls -- Moving Comet Medal Platform
ClipCutRoadE.Notes: A green moving platform used in the first mission of Haunty Halls Galaxy.

ClipCutRoadD.Name: Haunty Halls -- Red Horizontal Moving Stone Platform
ClipCutRoadD.Notes: A red moving platform used in the first mission of Haunty Halls Galaxy.

ClipCutRoadC.Name: Haunty Halls -- Green Horizontal Moving Stone Platform
ClipCutRoadC.Notes: A green moving platform used in the first mission of Haunty Halls Galaxy.

ClipCutRoadB.Name: Haunty Halls -- Red Diagonal Moving Stone Platform
ClipCutRoadB.Notes: A red moving platform used in the first mission of Haunty Halls Galaxy.

SeaGullGroupMarioFace.Name: Seagulls [Starship Mario]
SeaGullGroupMarioFace.Notes: A group of seagulls that appear in the background of Starship Mario if the player is currently in World 1.

GarigariCutStepOblique.Name: Puzzle Plank -- Long Oblique Piece of Wood with Holes
GarigariCutStepOblique.Notes: A long oblique piece of wood with several holes; used in Puzzle Plank Galaxy.

TamakoroPlanetStartPlanet.Name: Rolling Masterpiece -- Starting Planet
TamakoroPlanetStartPlanet.Notes: The planet used at the start of Rolling Masterpiece Galaxy.

WaterFortressRotateStepB.Name: Space Storm -- Blue Rotating Metal Platforms
WaterFortressRotateStepB.Notes: A set of blue rotating metal platforms from Space Storm Galaxy.

GarigariCutStepFlatThinRight.Name: Puzzle Plank -- Right Thin Piece of Wood
GarigariCutStepFlatThinRight.Notes: A right-sided thin piece of wood used in Puzzle Plank Galaxy.

WaterFortressRotateStepA.Name: Space Storm -- Red Rotating Metal Platforms
WaterFortressRotateStepA.Notes: A set of red rotating metal platforms from Space Storm Galaxy.

YoshiEatGuidanceArea.Name: Yoshi Tongue Explanation Area
YoshiEatGuidanceArea.Notes: An area which shows the player how to use Yoshi's tongue.

BeyondHellValleySky.Name: Shiverburn Sky
BeyondHellValleySky.Notes: The sky model from Shiverburn Galaxy that features the infamous alien creatures.

KoteBug.Name: Flipbug
KoteBug.Notes: A small bug-like enemy that attacks the player in Bee form and runs away from the player under normal conditions.

AttackRockTutorial.Name: Bowser Attack Rock [Stage]
AttackRockTutorial.Notes: A yellow orb that appears before the fights against Bowser.

ClipCutRoadA.Name: Haunty Halls -- Green Vertical Moving Stone Platform
ClipCutRoadA.Notes: A green moving platform used in the first mission of Haunty Halls Galaxy.

TamakoroGarigariCylinderPlanet.Name: Rolling Masterpiece -- Solid Grinder Platform
TamakoroGarigariCylinderPlanet.Notes: The last wooden platform from the Grinder section in Rolling Masterpiece Galaxy that does not disappear.

BigRelayPlanetA.Name: Generic Large Asteroid
BigRelayPlanetA.Notes: A floating asteroid that appears in Good Egg Galaxy and Boss Blitz Galaxy.

LavaSparksS.Name: Small Lava Sparks
LavaSparksS.Notes: A small lava sparks particle effect.

HolePlanetInsideSky.Name: Spin-Dig Sky
HolePlanetInsideSky.Notes: The sky model used in Spin-Dig Galaxy.

ItemBlockSwitch.Name: Switch ? Block
ItemBlockSwitch.Notes: A ? Block that triggers a switch after being hit.

ZeroGravityRoomPlanet.Name: Slipsand -- 2D Underground Room
ZeroGravityRoomPlanet.Notes: The 2D underground section from Slipsand Galaxy.

ItemCollectionPlanet.Name: Starship Mario -- Power-Up Display Room
ItemCollectionPlanet.Notes: The power-up display room used on Starship Mario.

StrayTico.Name: Silver Star
StrayTico.Notes: A Silver Star that is trapped in a bubble. The player usually has to collect five of them to make a Power Star appear.

TreasureBoxGoldEmpty.Name: Empty Golden Treasure Chest
TreasureBoxGoldEmpty.Notes: A gold treasure chest that reveals nothing when opened.

StarPieceFlow.Name: Moving Star Bit Group
StarPieceFlow.Notes: Creates a group of Star Bits that move on a set path.

SwitchingMoveBuzzAreaBlockRed.Name: Flip-Out -- Chopper Section Red Walls
SwitchingMoveBuzzAreaBlockRed.Notes: A set of red walls used in the middle section of Flip-Out Galaxy's main planet.

CymbalsStep.Name: Cloudy Court -- Cymbals Platform
CymbalsStep.Notes: The cymbals used in Cloudy Court Galaxy.

SmokeEffectColorArea.Name: Running Dust Color Area
SmokeEffectColorArea.Notes: An area that can be used to change the running dust particles color in SMG2.

DrumBegomanHolePlanet.Name: Space Storm -- Long Topman Planet
DrumBegomanHolePlanet.Notes: The tower planet used in the second mission of Space Storm Galaxy.

RelayDrill2DPlanet.Name: Spin-Dig -- Cylinder Planet
RelayDrill2DPlanet.Notes: The cylindrical-shaped planet used in the second mission of Spin-Dig Galaxy.

CumulativeTimerSwitchArea.Name: Timer Switch Area
CumulativeTimerSwitchArea.Notes: Activates a switch after a defined number of frames have passed while the player stays inside this area.

KoopaBattleLv3Planet.Name: Galaxy Generator -- Bowser Battle Planet
KoopaBattleLv3Planet.Notes: The planet where Bowser is fought in Bowser's Galaxy Generator.

LavaSnowBallConveyPlanet.Name: Freezy Flake -- Lava Planet
LavaSnowBallConveyPlanet.Notes: The lava planet used at the end of the first mission of Freezy Flake Galaxy.

HomingKiller.Name: Bullet Bill Spawner
HomingKiller.Notes: A bullet-like enemy that may home onto the player if they get in its range.

PlayerSideRetainOffArea.Name: Disable Movement Direction Retention Area
PlayerSideRetainOffArea.Notes: This area adjusts the player's movement direction to the current camera angle instead of keeping the direction the joystick was held in before moving.

VsKoopaLv3Sky.Name: Galaxy Generator Sky
VsKoopaLv3Sky.Notes: The sky model used in Bowser's Galaxy Generator.

TubeSliderCrystal.Name: "TubeSliderCrystal" [Broken]
TubeSliderCrystal.Notes: Model files have been removed. Therefore, the object is useless.

CrescentSeesawPlanet.Name: Boo Moon -- Rotatable Crescent Moon
CrescentSeesawPlanet.Notes: The rotatable crescent moon used in Boo Moon Galaxy.

SnowMoundL.Name: Snow Tree
SnowMoundL.Notes: A large destroyable tree made of snow; used in Freezy Flake Galaxy.

WaterStream.Name: Water Current
WaterStream.Notes: A water current that pushes the player away.

GoroRockLanePartsFlatA.Name: Bowling Challenge -- Flat Blue Platform
GoroRockLanePartsFlatA.Notes: A flat blue platform used in The Chimp's bowling challenge in Melty Monster Galaxy.

TeresaPicture.Name: Boo Picture
TeresaPicture.Notes:
A picture of a Boo or Bomb Boo. The TexChange frame IDs for the different pictures are:
0 Boo
1 Empty
2 Bomb Boo

BombHeiLauncher.Name: Bob-omb Dispenser
BombHeiLauncher.Notes: An enemy dispenser that releases Bob-ombs.

CannonRelayPlanet.Name: Boom Bunker -- Checkpoint Planet
CannonRelayPlanet.Notes: The multi-colored planet used in the middle of Bowser Jr.'s Boom Bunker.

Popo.Name: Smeech
Popo.Notes: A pink enemy that tries to suck on Yoshi, but runs away from the player under normal circumstances.

TamakoroJumpGuidanceArea.Name: Star Ball Jumping Explanation Area
TamakoroJumpGuidanceArea.Notes: An area which shows the player how to jump with the Star Ball while inside it.

TimeAttackClock.Name: Plus Clock
TimeAttackClock.Notes: A stopwatch that adds additional seconds to the Comet timer.

BgmChangeArea.Name: Music Change Area
BgmChangeArea.Notes: Changes the stage's background music in various different ways if entered.

BlueStarCupsulePlanet.Name: Pull Star Planet
BlueStarCupsulePlanet.Notes: A transparent planet with a Pull Star inside; used in Space Junk Galaxy, Ghostly Galaxy and Space Storm Galaxy.

KuriboFence.Name: Fluffy Bluff -- Circular Fence
